pages.text: This dimension is very densely packed with depth stone and depth ores and only a few $(l:e_dimension_depth_shafts)Shafts/el and some $(l:e_structure_dwarf_base)Dwarf Bases/el. There are no natural caves and the top and bottom of the world are made out of bedrock.

To reach this dimension you need to shift right-click with a $(l:e_item_teleportation_crystal)Teleportation Crystal/el. You will spawn somewhere in the middle of the dimension in a 1x2x1 empty space from where you can start your journey.
